answer.para: Okay, so this isn't really a FAQ but i had to put it somewhere. ;-)
This FAQ is dedicated, not to a beautiful woman, but to my Uncle John, who first suggested (in the kindest possible way) that i should get, "a real operating system."

Thanks go to...
All the guys (and all of the few girls as well, wish there were more of you) on the lists, from whose answers so many of these answers come.
Especially those of you who sort out a question, it's symptoms, and it's answer and mail the lot to me. Your names are immortalized in the commit logs (though only for the span of a digital forever, but hey, i try :-)
Tushar Teredesai and Jeroen Coumans who have been particularly tireless in posting FAQ links to lfs-support.
The BLFS editors whose book produces so delightfully few FAQs.
